ENGLISH: The Red Arrow
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The Red Arrow

ENGLISH: The ancient friendship between the House of Eorl and Gondor allows you to send a Red Arrow in times of need, signifying your situation is dire and that your ally should send forces with all haste. Is it time to send the Red Arrow?
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The ancient friendship between the House of Eorl and Gondor allows you to send a Red Arrow in times of need, signifying your situation is dire and that your ally should send forces with all haste. Is it time to send the Red Arrow?

ENGLISH: Yes, send a swift rider to Rohan!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ Yes, send a swift rider to Rohan!

ENGLISH: No, Gondor can handle this alone.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ No, Gondor can handle this alone.

ENGLISH: The Red Arrow
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The Red Arrow

ENGLISH: A Rider from Gondor appears, and kneels presenting the Red Arrow. Their borders are threatened - Gondor calls for aid!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ A Rider from Gondor appears, and kneels presenting the Red Arrow. Their borders are threatened - Gondor calls for aid!

ENGLISH: And Rohan shall answer. Muster the Rohirrim!
FRENCH: @FIXME@ And Rohan shall answer. Muster the Rohirrim!

ENGLISH: The Red Arrow
FRENCH: @FIXME@ The Red Arrow

ENGLISH: An answer returns from Rohan - the Rohirrim are mustering, and will honor the Oath of Eorl with all their might.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ An answer returns from Rohan - the Rohirrim are mustering, and will honor the Oath of Eorl with all their might.

ENGLISH: They are true friends indeed.
FRENCH: @FIXME@ They are true friends indeed.

ENGLISH: We shall help our friends!
